meanings.definition: A person or thing that extracts.
meanings.sent1: The extractor collected honey from the beehive.
meanings.sent2: The juice extractor separated the pulp from the orange juice.
meanings.sent3: The clever extractor managed to get the cat out of the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an extractor, drawing out the truth from everyone.
meanings.sent5: The extractor was like a magnet, pulling out all the metal pieces from the sand.

meanings.definition: A tool or device used for extracting.
meanings.sent1: The extractor removed the nail from the wood effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: She used the garlic extractor to crush the cloves for cooking.
meanings.sent3: The extractor in the kitchen made extracting juice so much easier.
meanings.sent4: His words were like an extractor, pulling out the hidden emotions.
meanings.sent5: The extractor hummed softly as it separated the seeds from the fruit.
